name: Polite animals
description:
This is a highly challenging casual relaxation game.



This is a fast dodge type game.

The ball will continue to move forward, and you need to manipulate it to avoid upcoming obstacles.



Send the ball home, avoid numerous obstacles, and accumulate wealth by obtaining diamonds on the way. In the game, you will play as a brave little ball, facing various complex obstacles and traps. Through flexible finger sliding operations, you need to constantly jump, turn, and roll to avoid falling or hitting obstacles. The exquisite graphics and beautiful sound effects of the game will immerse you in it and experience new gaming fun.



Challenge yourself, push your limits, and become a king! Come and experience this challenging game.
